page.title: 03Better life for Millerston?
page.content: Looking ahead, people did not seem to feel that the sorry situation of unemployment would improve within the next 10 years.Some of the unemployed indicated that they felt hopeful{ {(35%)},but most said they were not hopeful of getting a job in the future {(65%)}. The{UK}unemployment rate is about { {15%}at the moment.Most of the families we interviewed felt that the job situation would get worse{(88%)}.Only{ {12%}said they thought the situation would improve. All in all, the job situation in Millerston does not look very hopeful for the future.In fact it is very bleak and is affecting many people's lives and how they view the future.
